trans-unit.source: Setting a custom domain name on a web app in Azure App Service that is load balanced by Traffic Manager is only available for **Standard** mode websites.
trans-unit.target: Setting a custom domain name on a web app in Azure App Service that is load balanced by Traffic Manager is only available for **Standard** mode websites.

trans-unit.source: Before switching a web app from the Free App Service plan mode to the Shared, Basic or Standard mode, you must first remove spending caps in place for your App Service subscription.
trans-unit.target: Before switching a web app from the Free App Service plan mode to the Shared, Basic or Standard mode, you must first remove spending caps in place for your App Service subscription.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the App Service plan modes, including how to change the mode of your site, see [How to scale web sites](../article/app-service-web/web-sites-scale.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information on the App Service plan modes, including how to change the mode of your site, see [How to scale web sites](../article/app-service-web/web-sites-scale.md).
